body_html: The whole pattern is unclear a bit. If I'm using DataParallel i assume my model and data are supposed to be on all devices? However, tutorials say to copy it to one of them with model.to(device='cuda:0') or something similar. Is it replicated by default? Isn't it?
body_text: The whole pattern is unclear a bit. If I'm using DataParallel i assume my model and data are supposed to be on all devices? However, tutorials say to copy it to one of them with model.to(device='cuda:0') or something similar. Is it replicated by default? Isn't it?
body: The whole pattern is unclear a bit. If I'm using `DataParallel` i assume my model and data are supposed to be on all devices? However, tutorials say to copy it to one of them with `model.to(device='cuda:0')` or something similar. Is it replicated by default? Isn't it?
